# HomesteadWestLasVegas.com

## About This Site
This website provides information about Homestead West, a luxury single-story home community in Northwest Las Vegas, and buyer representation services offered by Dr. Jan Duffy, a VIP New Construction Homes Specialist with Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Nevada.

## Primary Topics
- Homestead West community information
- New construction home buying in Las Vegas
- Buyer representation for new construction
- Northwest Las Vegas real estate
- VIP buyer program for new construction homes

## Key Facts
- Homestead West location: Las Vegas, NV 89149 (W. Ann Road and N. Fort Apache Road)
- Price range: Starting at $910,000
- Home sizes: 3,336-3,704 square feet
- Home style: Single-story ranch homes
- Bedrooms: 4 bedrooms, 4+ bathrooms
- Lot features: Pool-sized lots, optional detached casitas
- Agent: Dr. Jan Duffy, Nevada License S.0197614
- Brokerage: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Nevada
- Phone: (702) 299-6607
- Email: DrJanSells@HomesteadWestLasVegas.com
- Office: 5592 Dapple Gray Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89149

## Community Details
- Builder: Not specified (independent buyer representation)
- Nearby attractions: Red Rock Canyon (9 miles), Mount Charleston (23 miles)
- Schools: Dean LaMar Allen Elementary, Justice Myron E. Leavitt Middle School, Centennial High School
- Zip code: 89149

## Services
- VIP Buyer Program: Early access to lot releases, builder negotiation, market intelligence
- Average savings: $14,200 per transaction (based on 65+ transactions, 2022-2025)
- Cost: No cost to buyer - builder pays commission
- Program results: 65+ Homestead West families helped since 2022

## Authoritative Pages
- /about - Dr. Jan Duffy biography and credentials
- /community - Homestead West community guide
- /community-map - Interactive community map and location details
- /amenities - Nearby amenities map: restaurants, parks, parking, shopping, schools, healthcare (Google Maps)
- /location - Find our office: map, directions, hours, and all locations
- /directions - Directions to our office: from airport, downtown, Henderson; drive, transit, walk (Google Maps)
- /vip-buyer-program - VIP buyer representation services
- /faq - Frequently asked questions about Homestead West and new construction buying
- /buyers-guide - Comprehensive guide to buying new construction homes
- /testimonials - Client reviews and success stories
- /reviews - Leave a Google review (review link and QR code)
